test_uniform_flow Module Reference
test_transport

Test of mass transport convergence in uniform flow that switches direction The purpose of this test is to check for some issues involving symmetry. More...

 Starts at zero.

Detailed Description

Test of mass transport convergence in uniform flow that switches direction The purpose of this test is to check for some issues involving symmetry.

real(stm_real), intent(in)  solution_center

Generates fine solution of initial condition and final values to compare for uniform flow advection.

Parameters:
[in]nconcNumber of time steps at finest gird
[in]nx_baseNumber of cells in finest grid
[out]fine_initial_conditionInitial condition at finest resolution
[out]fine_solutionReference solution at finest resolution
[in]ic_centerInitial condition center of mass
[in]solution_centerSolution's center of mass
[in]ic_gaussian_sdInitial condition's standard deviation
[in]solution_gaussian_sdSolution's standard deviation
[in]originOrigin
[in]domain_lengthDomain length
